"Dated this the 9Â° day of January, 2018
ORDER

Annexure A12 proceedings have been initiated before
the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Chottanikara, by
the Chottanikara Police under Section 107 Cr.P.C.

2. Much discussion is not required to conclude that
there are no materials to initiate proceedings under Section
107 Cr.P.C. as against the petitioner. Matters being so,
Annexure A712 is liable to be quashed.

In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-
A12 proceedings, as against the petitioner, are hereby
quashed.

Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE.
